name: Odyssee
description:
Hi there! I'm Odyssee, but since we are friends you can call me Ody.First: my adventure it's a mix of genres.
I'll be fighting like the Italian plumber in:

  • platform levels;
  • enigma dungeons;
  • the only underwater level you'll ever like to play in a 2D game.

We're friends, huh? Well, I suppose. If not... I don't care. If you are, I don't care, but thank anyway.
I work as a coffee machine. Yeah, press "K" and you will taste my fabolous "Kaffee".

I was born in a far away galaxy, a long time ago. In a robo-civilization. My name sealed my fate. A lifetime adventure was in my destiny. In 1944, a nazi robot legion was sent to conquer my world, using a time machine. The nazi expedition was a success and my robot-girlfriend (a rogirl) was kidnapped. I tried to defend her by the evil nazis! But I even lost one of his eyes in the fight. Damn!

It's high time you help me to find my girlfriend. Starting from her bra.
Yeah, thos nazi-robots were a little bunch of perverts. And, huh, so am I.
